condition.if: what do you know about me

effect.then: I sense that you are sometimes insecure, especially with people you don't know very well. Does this make sense to you?
You have a great deal of unused capacity, which you have not turned to your advantage. Does this make sense to you?
You prefer a certain amount of change and variety and become dissatisfied when hemmed in by restrictions and limitations. Am I right?
You pride yourself as an independent thinker and do not accept others statements without satisfactory proof. Does this make sense to you?
Sometimes you have a tendency to be critical of yourself. Yes?
At times you have serious doubts as to whether you have made the right decision or done the right thing. Right?
At times you are extroverted, sociable, while at other times you are introverted, wary, reserved. Is it true?
While you have some personality weaknesses, you are generally able to compensate for them. Is it true?
You have a box of old unsorted photographs in your house. Haven't you?
You had an accident when you were a child involving water. Hadn't you?
Most of the time you are positive and cheerful, but there has been a time in the past when you were very upset. True?
You are a very kind and considerate person, but when somebody does something to break your trust, you feel deep-seated anger. Isn't that true?
